mapper.select: SELECT WS_NAME, WS_LOC, WS_NUM, WS_CODE FROM WORKSPACE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE(EMP_CODE, USER_ID, WS_CODE, EMP_CONFIRM, EMP_RESIGN) VALUES(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || EMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id},#{ws_code},'D','2222-02-22')
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_CODE,e.USER_ID USER_ID,WS_CODE, EMP_CONFIRM,u.USER_TYPE USER_TYPE,u.USER_NAME USER_NAME, u.USER_ADDRESS USER_ADDRESS,u.USER_PHONE USER_PHONE,u.USER_BIRTH USER_BIRTH, u.USER_GENDER USER_GENDER,u.USER_EMAIL USER_EMAIL FROM EMPLOYEE e , USERINFO u WHERE e.USER_ID = u.USER_ID AND u.USER_TYPE ='employee' AND EMP_CONFIRM ='D' AND WS_CODE =#{ws_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_HIREDATE=TO_DATE(#{emp_hiredate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), EMP_HIREDATE_END=TO_DATE(#{emp_hiredate_end},'YYYY-MM-DD'), EMP_WORKTIME_TIME=#{emp_worktime_time}, EMP_HOLIDAY=#{emp_holiday}, EMP_SALARY=#{emp_salary}, EMP_POSITION=#{emp_position}, EMP_SALARY_DAY=#{emp_salary_day}, EMP_APPLY=TO_DATE(#{emp_apply},'YYYY-MM-DD'), EMP_RANK=#{emp_rank}, EMP_CONFIRM='S' WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} AND WS_CODE=#{ws_code}
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_CONFIRM='G' WHERE EMP_CODE=#{emp_code}
mapper.select: SELECT e.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE, e.USER_ID USER_ID, e.WS_CODE, e.EMP_RANK EMP_RANK, TO_CHAR(e.EMP_HIREDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EMP_HIREDATE, TO_CHAR(e.EMP_HIREDATE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') EMP_HIREDATE_END, e.EMP_POSITION EMP_POSITION, e.EMP_WORKTIME_TIME EMP_WORKTIME_TIME, e.EMP_HOLIDAY EMP_HOLIDAY, EMP_SALARY, EMP_SALARY_DAY, EMP_CONFIRM, TO_CHAR(EMP_APPLY,'YYYY-MM-DD') EMP_APPLY, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_NAME, USER_ADDRESS, USER_GENDER, USER_BIRTH FROM EMPLOYEE e , USERINFO u WHERE u.USER_ID = e.USER_ID AND EMP_CODE=#{emp_code} AND WS_CODE=#{ws_code}

SELECT e.EMP_CODE EMP_CODE,u.USER_ID USER_ID, USER_TYPE, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_NAME, USER_ADDRESS, USER_GENDER, USER_BIRTH, EMP_HIREDATE, EMP_HIREDATE_END, EMP_POSITION, EMP_WORKTIME_TIME,EMP_CODE, EMP_HOLIDAY, EMP_SALARY, EMP_SALARY_DAY, EMP_APPLY, EMP_RANK, WS_CODE FROM USERINFO u, EMPLOYEE e WHERE EMP_CONFIRM='S' AND e.USER_ID = u.USER_ID AND WS_CODE=#{ws_code}

SELECT EMP_CODE, u.USER_ID ,USER_TYPE, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_NAME, USER_ADDRESS, USER_GENDER, USER_BIRTH, EMP_HIREDATE, EMP_HIREDATE_END, EMP_POSITION, EMP_WORKTIME_TIME, EMP_HOLIDAY, EMP_SALARY, EMP_SALARY_DAY, EMP_APPLY, EMP_RANK FROM USERINFO u ,EMPLOYEE e WHERE u.USER_ID = e.USER_ID AND e.USER_ID=#{user_id} AND WS_CODE=#{ws_code}
